CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Billing_Country__c ) || ISBLANK( Account__r.BillingCountry ), "", IF( Billing_Country__c = Account__r.BillingCountry, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + Account__r.BillingCountry ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - Billing Country
